content: Be sure to search to the very back of the room, behind a tiger statue, and you’ll find an altar with a pot you can open to reveal a **Celestial Nonary Pill** , increasing your maximum stamina!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Despair' and the sub-subsection 'The Loong’s Secret Tomb'.
The content is as follows:
Be sure to search to the very back of the room, behind a tiger statue, and you’ll find an altar with a pot you can open to reveal a **Celestial Nonary Pill** , increasing your maximum stamina!
